title: Additional FSI for Commercial user development in Central Business District (CBD) or plot situated i
clause_text: Additional FSI for Commercial user development in Central Business District (CBD) or plot situated in Residential or Commercial Zone or Independent plot wherein Residential or Commercial uses allowed in Industrial zone :
